jobDescription: DescriptionXilinx is the world's leading provider of All Programmable FPGAs, SoCs and 3D ICs. These industry-leading devices are coupled with a next-generation design environment and IP to serve a broad range of customer needs, from programmable logic to programmable systems integration. Our All Programmable devices underpin today's most advanced electronics. Among the broad range of end markets we serve are:Aerospace/DefenseAutomotiveBroadcastConsumerHigh Performance ComputingIndustrial / Scientific / Medical (ISM)WiredWirelessPlatform Applications Engineering group is a fast paced and dynamic group with a charter to deliver high quality “go to market” collateral like System Platforms, Reference Designs, Demos, Application Notes and Documentation. Collateral targets key end markets that include Video, Embedded Vision, Data Center Acceleration, Automotive and Industrial with increased focus on emerging technologies like Network Acceleration/Virtualization and Machine Learning. Team is also actively engaged in solving customer issues and enhancing customer experience.  We are looking for a strong leader who can lead the software aspects of the solutions in above markets by being the voice for the team representing the group in cross functional engagements. The role requires the candidate to manage a team of software engineers in San Jose and provide leadership and guidance to a team located in Hyderabad, India. Candidate will be responsible for developing/architecting/delivering System Platforms, Applications and solutions. Candidate will participate in forums to help define solutions. Candidate will work with a cross functional team on enhancing customer experience by solving customer issues for Xilinx’s All Programmable System on a Chip Product line.
